items.label: Documentation: Configuring Backup Policies with GCP Veeam Service

Backup/Backup Developer workstation with.title: Documentation: Configuring Backup Policies with GCP Veeam Service

Backup/Backup kubernetes namespace with.id: Backup/Backup kubernetes namespace with Kasten10 by Veeam
Backup/Backup kubernetes namespace with.title: Backup kubernetes namespace with Kasten10 by Veeam
Backup/Backup kubernetes namespace with.description: This documentation provides a step-by-step guide on how to configure backup policies using the GCP Veeam service. By following these instructions, you can effectively manage and store backups for your namespaces in Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Video tutorials are included to demonstrate the configuration process.

Backup/Installatation of Kasten10 by Vea.title: Installatation of Kasten10 by Veaam
Backup/Installatation of Kasten10 by Vea.description: Step 1: Create a K10 Service Account

Backup/Introduction.title: Veeam Use Cases
Backup/Introduction.description: Veeam is a comprehensive backup and disaster recovery solution that offers various use cases to meet the needs of different organizations. Here are some common use cases where Veeam proves to be valuable:

Configuration Management/Ansible.title: Running Ansible Playbook with Dynamic Inventory
Configuration Management/Ansible.description: This documentation provides a step-by-step guide on how to run an Ansible playbook with dynamic inventory on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). By the end of this guide, you should be able to transfer an SSH public key to workstations using bash scripts and run an Ansible playbook on GCP instances.

Configuration Management/Installing AWX.title: Installing AWX
Configuration Management/Installing AWX.description: How to install AWX using kubernetes operator

Continous Integration/Installation of Je.title: Installation of Jenkins
Continous Integration/Installation of Je.description: The following steps outline the process of installing and configuring Jenkins for continuous integration.

Continous Integration/Jenkins Pipelines/.title: AWX Trigger Pipeline
Continous Integration/Jenkins Pipelines/.description: The AWX Trigger pipeline is responsible for triggering Ansible Tower jobs in AWX. It allows you to automate the execution of specific job templates from within your Jenkins pipeline.

Continous Integration/Jenkins Pipelines/.title: Serverspec Testing Pipeline
Continous Integration/Jenkins Pipelines/.description: The Serverspec Testing pipeline is responsible for executing Serverspec tests on multiple instances in parallel. It automates the process of installing Serverspec on developers' instances, copying the test files, and running the tests.

Continous Integration/overview.title: Overview
Continous Integration/overview.description: This comprehensive guide will provide you with all the information you need to effectively set up and manage your remote development environment.

Developer Access/Access GCP instance.title: Access GCP instance
Developer Access/Access GCP instance.description: Step 1 install ssh plugin in VSCODE

DevOps Modules/DevOps Modules.title: DevOps Course
DevOps Modules/DevOps Modules.description: The workflow of this course is that we will learn DevOps culture and it's tools while creating a project and we will start step by step in case of a basic knowledge is needed in IT we will explain it so everyone are in the same level7

Getting Started/Requirements.title: How to start with the project
Getting Started/Requirements.description: In this guide, we'll walk you through the steps necessary to get started with the project.

Monitoring/ExposeMetrics.description: To expose metrics for each developer's VM in your project, we will be using Node Exporter. We have prepared a bash script to install Node Exporter using the gcloud CLI and the scp feature.
